Name: The Azmodeus Project
About the game: Game Story : The story takes place 7 years after the almost total destruction of human civilization. Planet earth was ravaged by diseases, famine and wars until the appearance of the Z virus, a consequence of all the factors mentioned above. The Z virus whose name comes from zombie virus spreads widely and quickly in an environment of misfortune and death, it is as if the world was offered to him on a golden platter. The population that had survived the diseases and the wars was now very weakened and faced with a danger that was far superior to them. Shortly after its appearance, the virus transformed the majority of the world's population into zombies. The few remaining commanders then unite in order to save what remains to be saved. It was there that they found you and put you on the Azmodeus project. A few years later, you are now well trained to survive in one of the islands chosen to try to restore civilization. Game Features : Zombie Survival Game with a focus on realistic survival. Customize your character with weapons and gear. Cut down trees, trade with NPCs, fish, hunt, farm, craft, search for loot, manage animals, and kill zombies. Open World island. Improve your Skills. Restoration and improvement of your survival base.
